titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2 Amino 6 Nitro Phenol 4 sulfonic acid.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/16/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on 2 Amino 6 Nitro Phenol 4 sulfonic acid.
